articles.author: Alex Stedman
articles.title: Activision Blizzard to Pay About $54 Million to Settle Major Gender Discrimination Lawsuit - IGN
articles.description: Activision Blizzard will pay approximately $54 million to settle a high-profile gender discrimination lawsuit filed more than two years ago by the California Civil Rights Department.
articles.content:
